State.Text: In front of you you see a big castle, and guarding it the diamond knight without moving
The diamond knight just staring at you...
At the moment you showed an act of aggression, the diamond knight moves very fast and you are dead...
When you turn around and walk away you suddenly hear a soft feminine voice behind you "Goodbye sweetyyyy!"
"Sure dude! All you need is to ask nicely! see all those dead bodies? they didn't ask nicely... shame"
